lines.text:
[to Rick]
Why did you have to show up? Couldn't you have found a rock or something to crawl under?
Well, I never thought so. But I could be prejudiced.
I know. And I wouldn't want it any other way.

You got to understand those 52 little monsters. I figure a card is like a woman. You pick it up, you study it and just when you're deciding whether or not to hold it, you put it down and somebody else picks it up.
